actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to undertake flood control measures in the Tug and Levisa Forks of the Big Sandy River and the Cumberland River, West Virginia and Kentucky, and of Grundy, Virginia.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to design, construct, and undertake flood control measures on portions of the Cumberland River, Kentucky, and the Big Sandy River, Kentucky, Virginia, and West Virginia.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to undertake flood control measures in the Tug and Levisa Forks of the Big Sandy River and the Cumberland River, West Virginia and Kentucky, and of Grundy, Virginia.
